instruction: How can I withdraw a cab request in One Transport
output: Please note that the SLA for cab cancellation is 1 hour for drop and 6 hours for pickup. Missed call number for cab request cancellation to avoid No Show before SLA is: Login: 08045936066 Logout: 08045936067 If you are facing issues with the missed call option or if it is not working please use the cancellation option available in One Transport application. Please find the below navigation to cancel the cab: 1. Login to One Transport Application 2. Trip Details 3. Choose Trips 4. Click on the right trip 5. Cancel You will be asked for the confirmation for cab cancellation. 6. Click confirm and cancel.

instruction: Why does Talview show a User not found error for me
output: For Evaluator or Panel access in Talview it will be auto enabled for all Grade level associates except Intern/contractors/Trainee. Please raise GSD if you are getting error in Talview page or your access is not auto- enabled along with the error screenshot.For Recruiter Access: In order to get Talview recruiter access you need to get CHire access first. Once you got chire access requesting you to get yourself added either as collaborator primary recruiter or recruiter assistant to any RR ID in CHire. It will auto-enable your access to Talview. Please raise GSD to CHire team if you dont have CHire access as it is mandatory to proceed further. For Existing Talview User but still facing login issue:Please reach out to support@talview.com. Talview team will help you in enabling the access and revert. You can also reach Talview support team at: US: 1.209.362.3489APAC / India: 91.80.6741.4716 UK: 44.135.746.4011.

instruction: job code change
output: To change the job code in an existing open SO follow these steps:  1. Login to https://compass.esa.cognizant.com  and  Click on Main Menu and select Resource Management. 2. Click on Request Resource and then select Create or Review SO. 3. Search by SO ID and Project ID. 4. Modify the Job code field with the desired job code. 5. Click on Complete Order. 6. Click on Save and Submit to submit the updated SO request.  Please note that only the job code field can be modified in an existing open SO. If you need to modify any other information please contact the TSC Shared Services team through the Servicenow portal https://ctsccprod.service-now.com/ss . Explore additional resources about SO Simplification on Be.Cognizant.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: Why cant I nominate myself or a team member for a business Visa
output: Nomination is available only for PM Associate and Global Mobility team members in GM360 Application. 1. If you are doing a self nomination please check if an in-progress case is available for same Country of Travel and Visa Type. 2. If you are trying to initiate nomination for an associate who is reporting under you nomination is restricted for Home Manager HM role. 3. For PM role nomination can be done only for the project you are marked as the Project Manager. Also please re-validate if the nominee is having an in-progress case for same Country of Travel and Visa Type.
text:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Why cant I nominate myself or a team member for a business Visa<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

Nomination is available only for PM Associate and Global Mobility team members in GM360 Application. 1. If you are doing a self nomination please check if an in-progress case is available for same Country of Travel and Visa Type. 2. If you are trying to initiate nomination for an associate who is reporting under you nomination is restricted for Home Manager HM role. 3. For PM role nomination can be done only for the project you are marked as the Project Manager. Also please re-validate if the nominee is having an in-progress case for same Country of Travel and Visa Type.<|eot_id|>

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How can I continue to use my American Express Card if I relocate to another country on a payroll transfer
output: In case of relocation to another country your Amex card in your relocation origination country will be cancelled on your new assignment and payroll start date. You must apply for a new Amex card in your new country. If you have previously resided in your new country you had an Amex card in that country and it was cancelled less than one year ago you can request that it be reinstated by emailing AmexCoreTeam2@cognizant.com. Otherwise you must apply for a new card ASAP AFTER your future country assignment has been processed. Associates must submit any outstanding Corporate Card expenditures on an expense report prior to leaving your relocation origination country.

instruction: What is Green House Gases Protocol and scope 1/2/3 emissions Reduction
output: GHG Protocol is international reference standard that establishes comprehensive global standardized frameworks to measure and manage greenhouse gas GHG emissions from private and public sector operations value chains and mitigation actions.Greenhouse gas emissions are classified under 3 scopes  scope 1/2/3.Scope 1  These are direct emissions such as fuel and chemicals e.g. gas used by vehicles refrigerants used to cool offices and data centers.Scope 2  These are indirect emissions from purchased energy and heat in ofces and data center operations. electricity steam heat generated by third parties and used in facilities operations.Scope 3 - all other indirect emissions including those that come from the supply chain of cognizant operations including for example the procurement of equipment supporting services business travel disposal of waste employee commute etc.

instruction: How to update profile page in One Transport
output: Please follow the below navigation to update profile: 1. Login to https://onecognizant.cognizant.com 2. Search and launch One Transport application 3. Click on Profile from top right corner of the page 4. The below details are required for profile submission: 5. Present Address: Kindly update address in HCM application before 4 hours from profile update 6. Choose Nearest Landmark 7. Area: City amp Area 8. Office: City amp Facility 9. Mobile: Kindly update Phone number and authenticate it in HCM application before 4 hours from profile update 10. Special Condition if any: Expectant mother/Injured/Physically Challenged 11. IGS: Intergate Shuttle Service IGS field is a mandatory field in One Transport profile page to avail the Shuttle Transport services Click on yes to avail shuttle services once the profile is submitted the QR code will be enabled for scanning while availing shuttle services 12. Click on I Acknowledge box 13. Submit Profile Note: 1. Present address amp Authenticated phone number will be reflecting only after 4 hours after the update in HCM 2. All services will be combined and will be on shared basis only in adherence to the unified timings slots listed for the facility 3. Profile page completion is mandatory for raising any cab service requests.

instruction: Why did an invoice not get matched to a Purchase Order in Accounts Payable
output: Invoices and Purchase Orders can be mismatched for several reasons including:  Goods Receipt GRN or RC has not been updated: Once goods or services ordered against a Purchase Order are delivered to you you need to update the Goods Receipt GRN or RC in Ariba as an acknowledgement to the system. Related invoices will not be paid unless you process a GRN or RC. Check that the Supplier has printed the correct Purchase Order  on the invoice.  If all of these are in place request that the Accounts Payable team manually match the invoice against the PO by contacting GlobalP2PSupport@cognizant.com.

system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: How to change or amend a Purchase Order
output: Amendments to a Purchase Order are only possible when the PO is in Ordered Status. Modifying the Purchase Order will retrigger the approval flow and a new version of the Purchase Order will be sent to the vendor on approval. If a PO Purchase Order is in ordered status please follow the below instructions to make changes to it: Login to Ariba with the below link:     Ariba Login  Look for the PR Purchase Requisition number you are looking to make changes to under My Documents on the home page. Click on the PR number to enter the PR. Click on Edit on the top of the PR page. Make the necessary changes to the PR as needed. Click on Submit. If the Purchase Order is in Received status when you want to make a change contact Globalp2psupport@cognizant.com for assistance.

<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

Amendments to a Purchase Order are only possible when the PO is in Ordered Status. system: You are a helpful corporate AI assistant that helps employees with internal processes, applications, and workplace questions.
instruction: What is the process for filling out Form I-9 compliance
output: Section 1: Employee Information - The employee must complete this section on or before their first day of employment. It includes personal information such as full name maiden name if applicable date of birth address and immigration status. Section 2: Employer Review and Verification - After the employee completes Section 1 the employer or an authorized representative must review the employees original documents in person to verify their identity and work authorization. This should be done within three business days of the employees start date. The employer or authorized representative must record the document information in Section 2 including document title issuing authority document number and expiration date if applicable. The employer or authorized representative must also sign and date Section 2. Section 3: Reverification and Rehires - This section is used for re-verifying an employees work authorization if their employment authorization document expires. If you encounter any issues or errors: Raise a ticket under Form I-9 Compliance application support for assistance. Provide any relevant screenshots or error messages for further support.

The employer or authorized representative must also sign and date Section 2. instruction: How do I update the status of the quote What do the statuses mean
output: On the Quote Page you are able to update the status of each quote via a drop-down menu with the options of Not sent to client Sent to client Won Lost Cancelled. Each status other than Not sent to client will require a date to be entered. At that point no status update is allowed for any other quotes. Marking a Quote as Won will send the Pricing Artifact to WinZone and the Opportunity Data to EDS for consumption by downstream systems.

instruction: How to change the Bill-to address for purchare request
output: Please follow the below steps to change the bill to address: In your Ariba home screen look for the Purchase Request you have created. Look for the PR number you are looking to make changes to under My Documents on the home page. Click on the PR number to enter the PR. Click on Edit. Scroll to the line level select the line you wish to change and click on Actions. Click on Edit Details. Once inside the line scroll to the accounting section. Click on the dropdown in the Bill-to. Search for the address with the city/state and select the correct address. Scroll to the bottom and click on OK to return to the main page. Once on the main page you will see the option to Submit. Check if all the details are as needed and click on Submit.
